alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Franklin; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 9:17AM EST until January 04 at 10:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1015 AM EST/915 AM CST/. * At 916 AM EST/816 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blountstown to 6 miles west of Wewahitchka to 7 miles northeast of Mexico Beach to 11 miles southwest of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Blountstown, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Orange, Franklin, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Abe Springs, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Central City, Cape San Blas, Beverly, Overstreet and Scotts Ferry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM EST/100 PM CST/ for Big Bend of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 PM EST/100 PM CST/ for Big Bend of Florida.
